thread.title: JOBS: Optimistic outlook for Inland Empire at UCR forecast
thread.title_full: JOBS: Optimistic outlook for Inland Empire at UCR forecast - Press Enterprise

author: FIELDING BUCK
title: JOBS: Optimistic outlook for Inland Empire at UCR forecast
text:
BY FIELDING BUCK / STAFF WRITER
Published: Oct. 1, 2015 Updated: 12:18 p.m. Economists Christopher Thornberg and Jordan Levine are delivering a largely optimistic assessment of the Inland economy and job market this morning at the Sixth Annual Inland Southern California Economic Forecast.
Job growth is good, Levine told attendees at the Riverside Convention Center, and not just in logistics and "low wage and cheap dirt" industries. He said manufacturing and tech are doing well.
On the downside, Levine said the I.E. lags in education. Check back later today for more on the conference.
